dict.acceptation: 罕见的，特殊的；优秀的，不寻常的；稀薄的，经过稀化的；

sent.orig: All rare and unique items were scanned for duplicates.
sent.trans: 答：所有rare,unique的装备将被检查是否被复制过。

sent.orig: A thing or an event may be rare when it is found or occurs infrequently.
sent.trans: 很少见到的东西或很少发生的现象，可用rare一词来表达。

sent.orig: The Studies were performed with SE T_1 weighted image(T_1WI) ahd RARE T_2 weighted image (T_2WI)sequence.
sent.trans: SE序列为T_1加权成像(T_1wI); RARE序列为T2加权成像(T_2wI)。

sent.orig: WAITER: How would filet mignon, sir? Rare, medium rare, or well-done?
sent.trans: 服务生：腓力牛排要几分熟呢？五分熟？八分熟？还是全熟？

sent.orig: WAITER: How would you like your filet mignon, sir? Rare, medium rare, or well-done?
sent.trans: 服务生：要几分熟呢？五分熟？八分熟？还是全熟？
